title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 554 – 574) Review

description: A comprehensive review of the Fishman Island Arc episodes, covering the major battles and themes of the arc including the confrontation at Gyoncorde Plaza.

title: One Piece: Why Fish-Man Island Is Far More Important Than You Think
author: GameRant

title: One Piece Author Reveals Why He Created Hody Jones
author: GameRant
description: An article discussing Eiichiro Oda's 2012 interview where he explained that Hody Jones was created to highlight baseless racism in One Piece and the real world, representing hatred without personal grievance.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Hody Jones's character arc and ideology

title: One Piece's Creator Redeemed The Villain That Fans Hate The Most
author: ScreenRant
description: An article examining how Eiichiro Oda's intentional portrayal of Hody Jones as a representation of inherited racism redeems the character's purpose despite fan criticism.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses Hody Jones's complete character arc and thematic purpose
